content: Heading through the large red gate, you'll find the path curves left toward the Longevity Road Shrine, but a nearby field on the right has an enemy too big to ignore.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Valley_of_Ecstasy_Walkthrough.md', within the main section titled 'Valley of Ecstasy Walkthrough', specifically from the subsection 'Longevity Road'.
The content is as follows:
Heading through the large red gate, you'll find the path curves left toward the Longevity Road Shrine, but a nearby field on the right has an enemy too big to ignore.
